00040 #ifndef PHYSEVENTUSERINPUT_CPP
00041 #define PHYSEVENTUSERINPUT_CPP
00042 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00043 // This will expose all keyboard and mouse, joystick and other userinput events
00044 // to developers, we are using the SDL keymap to get us started, large portions
00045 // are directly copy/pasta'd, so we included their license too
00046 ///////////////////////////////////////

00068     {
00069

00072     EventUserInput::EventUserInput(const MetaCode &Code_)
00073     {
00074         Code.push_back(Code_);
00075     }
00076 
00077     EventUserInput::EventUserInput(const vector<MetaCode> &Code_)
00078     {
00079         AddCode(Code_);
00080     }

00083     {

00087     const MetaCode& EventUserInput::GetMetaCode(const unsigned int &Index)
00088     {
00089         return Code.at(Index);
00090     }
00091 
00092     unsigned int EventUserInput::GetMetaCodeCount()
00093     {
00094         return Code.size();
00095     }

00097     void EventUserInput::AddCode(const MetaCode &Code_)
00098     {
00099         Code.push_back(Code_);
00100     }

00102     void EventUserInput::AddCode(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00103     {
00104         MetaCode CurrentMetaCode( RawEvent_ );
00105         this->AddCode(CurrentMetaCode);
00106     }
00107 
00108     void EventUserInput::AddCode(const int &MetaValue_, const short unsigned int &ID_, const MetaCode::InputCode &Code_)
00109     {
00110         MetaCode CurrentMetaCode( MetaValue_, ID_, Code_ );
00111         this->AddCode(CurrentMetaCode);
00112     }
00113 
00114     void EventUserInput::AddCode(const vector<MetaCode> &Codes)
00115     {
00116         for(unsigned int c=0; Codes.size()>c ; c++)
00117         {
00118             Code.push_back(Codes.at(c));
00119         }
00120     }
00121 
00122 
00123     void EventUserInput::EraseCode(const MetaCode &Code_)
00124     {
00125         vector<MetaCode>::iterator iter;
00126 
00127         for(iter=Code.begin(); Code.end()!=iter ; iter++)
00128         {
00129             if(*iter == Code_)
00130             {
00131                 Code.erase(iter);
00132             }
00133         }
00134     }
00135 
00136     void EventUserInput::EraseCode(const unsigned int &Index)
00137     {
00138         Code.erase(Code.begin()+Index);
00139     }
00140 
00141     void EventUserInput::ToggleCode(const MetaCode &Code_)
00142     {
00143         vector<MetaCode>::iterator iter;
00144 
00145         bool ErasedOne= false;
00146 
00147         for(iter=Code.begin(); Code.end()!=iter ; iter++)
00148         {
00149             if(*iter == Code_)
00150             {
00151                 Code.erase(iter);
00152                 ErasedOne=true;
00153             }
00154         }
00155 
00156         if(!ErasedOne)
00157             {Code.push_back(Code_);}
00158     }

00160     EventBase::EventType EventUserInput::GetType() const
00161     {
00162         return UserInput;
00163     }
00164 
00165     void EventUserInput::AddCodesFromRawEvent(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00166     {
00167         switch(RawEvent_.type)
00168         {
00169             case SDL_KEYDOWN:   //Only contains one metacode
00170             case SDL_KEYUP:
00171                 this->AddCode(RawEvent_);
00172                 break;
00173 
00174             case SDL_MOUSEMOTION:       //Can contain Multiple Metacodes
00175                 this->AddCodesFromSDLMouseMotion(RawEvent_);
00176                 break;
00177             case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN:
00178             case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONUP:
00179                 this->AddCodesFromSDLMouseButton(RawEvent_);
00180                 break;
00181 
00182             case SDL_JOYAXISMOTION: //Incomplete
00183                 break;
00184             case SDL_JOYBUTTONDOWN:
00185                 break;
00186             case SDL_JOYBUTTONUP:
00187                 break;
00188             case SDL_JOYBALLMOTION:
00189                 break;
00190             case SDL_JOYHATMOTION:
00191                 break;
00192             default:
00193                 throw ("Unknown SDL Event Inserted");
00194                 break;
00195         }
00196     }
00197 
00198     EventUserInput& EventUserInput::operator += (const EventUserInput& Add)
00199     {
00200         for(unsigned int c=0; Add.Code.size()>c ; c++)
00201         {
00202             Code.push_back(Add.Code.at(c));
00203         }
00204         return *this;
00205     }

00207     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00208     // EventUserInput Private Methods

00210 
00211     void EventUserInput::AddCodesFromSDLMouseMotion(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00212     {
00213         this->AddCode(RawEvent_.motion.x,0,MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEHORIZONTAL);
00214         this->AddCode(RawEvent_.motion.y,0,MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEVERTICAL);
00215 
00216         if(0 != RawEvent_.motion.xrel)
00217             {this->AddCode(RawEvent_.motion.xrel,0,MetaCode::MOUSEVERTICAL);}
00218 
00219         if(0 != RawEvent_.motion.yrel)
00220             {this->AddCode(RawEvent_.motion.yrel,0,MetaCode::MOUSEHORIZONTAL);}
00221     }
00222 
00223     void EventUserInput::AddCodesFromSDLMouseButton(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00224     {
00225         //MetaCode::MetaCode(const int &MetaValue_, const short unsigned int &ID_, const MetaCode::InputCode &Code_)
00226         this->AddCode(RawEvent_.button.x,0,MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEHORIZONTAL);
00227 
00228         this->AddCode(RawEvent_.button.y,0,MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEVERTICAL);
00229 
00230         if ( SDL_BUTTON_WHEELUP==RawEvent_.button.button)
00231         {
00232             this->AddCode(MetaCode::MOUSEWHEEL_UP,0,MetaCode::MOUSEWHEELVERTICAL);
00233         }else if( SDL_BUTTON_WHEELDOWN==RawEvent_.button.button ){
00234             this->AddCode(MetaCode::MOUSEWHEEL_DOWN,0,MetaCode::MOUSEWHEELVERTICAL);
00235         }else{
00236             if(RawEvent_.button.state==SDL_PRESSED)
00237             {
00238                 this->AddCode(MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN, RawEvent_.button.button, MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON);
00239             }else{
00240                 this->AddCode(MetaCode::BUTTON_UP, RawEvent_.button.button, MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON);
00241             }
00242         }
00243     }
